title: How to promote my music and make money - Quora

response.answer_text: Live ShowsSpend more on you music than looking like your musicSpend on upgrading your skillsSpend for quality recording and distribution amongst various blogs/sites about underground music/upcoming artists of your genre in your area.YouTube.

Well. To earn some, you have to invest some. I would highly recommend getting a ‘PAID’ ReverbNation account. You get thousands of opportunities there. You have YouTube, Facebook, Twitter to share your music.
